            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">

                <br>

font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-75" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">20</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-76" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-77" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">12</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.19em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-78" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.01</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.62em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.625em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-79" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-80" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-81" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">480</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-82" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-83" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">u</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.15</mn><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>20</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>12</mn></mrow><mn>0.01</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>480</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-9">\rm F=m\frac{v-u}{t}=0.15\times\frac{-20-12}{0.01}=-480\ N </script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 2</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 200px; height: 109px;"></p>

<p>গতির দিকে 10s&nbsp;যাবত বল প্রয়োগ করা হলে, প্রথম 10s&nbsp;সময়ে ভরবেগের পরিবর্তন কত?</p>

                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="row questionOptions">
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p>ভরবেগের পরিবর্তন, <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-10-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>J</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mo>=</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-84" style="width: 4.018em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.281em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1003.24em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-85"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-86" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">J</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-87" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-88" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">F</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-89" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-90" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mo>=</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-10">\rm J=Ft=</script></span> গ্রাফের আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল&nbsp;</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-11-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-91" style="width: 15.166em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.42em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1012.38em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-92"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-93" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-94" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-95" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-96" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-97" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-100" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-101" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-102" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-103" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-104" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-105"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-106" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-107"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-108" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-109" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-110" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-111" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-112" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-113" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-114" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-115" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-116" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-117" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-11">=\frac{1}{2}\times4\times4+\frac{1}{2}\left(4+2\right)\times2+4\times2</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-12-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>22</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-118" style="width: 8.732em; </span>
            </div>
    </div>

<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 3</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-13-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>20</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-131" style="width: 2.796em; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-149" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-150" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">0.25</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.316em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.184em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>μ</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.25</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-15">\rm \mu_k=0.25</script></span> হলে গতিশীল অবস্থায় ঘর্ষণ বল কত?</p>

                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="row questionOptions">
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text">A</span>

            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p>গতিশীল অবস্থায় ঘর্ষণ বল,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-16-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.25</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>20</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>9.8</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>49</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-151" style="width: 15.412em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.625em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1012.58em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-152"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-153"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.109em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-154" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.658em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-155" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-156" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-157" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.58em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-158" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">μ</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.617em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-159" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-160" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-161" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-162" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.25</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-163" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-164" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">20</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-165" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-166" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">9.8</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-167" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-168" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">49</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-169" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-170" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>μ</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.25</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>20</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>9.8</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>49</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-16">\rm F_k=\mu_kR=0.25\times20\times9.8=49\ N</script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>

                <div class="serial"><span>Question 4</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>4 kg ভরের একটি বস্তুকে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-17-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>10</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-171" style="width: 4.249em;             <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p>ঘর্ষণ&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-19-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2.5</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-194" style="width: 7.42em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.068em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1006.03em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-195"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-196" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-197" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-198" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-199" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2.5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-200" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-201" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">10</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-202" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-203" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>2.5</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-19">\rm =4\times2.5=10\ N</script></span></p>

<p>বল&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-20-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>50</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-204" style="width: 14.305em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.723em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1011.68em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-205"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-206" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-207" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-208" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-209" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-210" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.109em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-211" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.658em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-212" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-213" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-214" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">10</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-215" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-216" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-217" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-218" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">10</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-219" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-220" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">50</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-221" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-222" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.103em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>50</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-20">\rm =ma+F_k=10\times4+10=50\ N</script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 5</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>কৌণিক ভরবেগের মাত্রা-</p>

                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="row questionOptions">
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">

                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-27-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>48</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>.</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-293" style="width: 3.008em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.461em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1002.37em, 2.37em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-294"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-295" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">48</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-296" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-297" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">h</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-298" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-299" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>48</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mo>.</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-27">\rm 48\ hr. </script></span></p>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>

            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">

top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-372" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-373" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-374" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-375" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">96</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-376" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-377" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">h</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-378" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-379" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.752em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>ω</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>ω</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi></msub><msubsup><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi></msub><mo>.</mo><msubsup><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mo>×</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>96</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mo>.</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-29">\rm I_1\omega_1=I_2\omega_2\Rightarrow\frac{2}{5}m_er_e^2\times\frac{2\pi}{T_1}={\frac{2}{5}m}_e.r_e^2\times4\times\frac{2\pi}{T_2} \Rightarrow T_2=4T_1=96\ hr. </script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 8</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>একটি রকেটের জ্বালানী নির্গমনের হার 60 gm/s। জ্বালানী নির্গমনের বেগ <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-30-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>5</mn></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-380" style="width: 6.783em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.553em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.269em, 1005.52em, 2.61em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-381"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-382" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-383" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-384" style="padding-left: 0.225em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.418em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.97em, 4.137em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-385"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-386"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-387" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.395em; left: 1.008em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-388" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-389" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-390" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-391" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-392"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-393"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-394" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">/</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-395" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span></span><span style="display: inline-block;                 </div>
            </div>

            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-33-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>u</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi></msub><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>5</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>60</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>7</mn></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>300</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-424" style="width: 24.674em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 20.207em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1020.17em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.047em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-425"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-426"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.625em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-427" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.658em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-428"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-429"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-430" style="font-size: 70.7%; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-437" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-438" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-439" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.109em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.99em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.49em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-444"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-445" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-446" style="font-size: 70.7%; top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-447"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-448" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-449" style="font-size: 70.7%; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-450" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-451" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-454" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-455"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-456"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-457" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-458" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-459" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-460" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">60</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-461" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-462" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-463" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-464" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-465"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-466"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-467" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-468" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">7</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-469" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-470" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-471" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-472" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-473" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-474" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">300</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-475" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-476" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">u</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi></msub><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>5</mn></msup><mo>×</mo><mn>60</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>7</mn></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>300</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-33">\rm F_{thrust}=v_r\ \left(\frac{dm}{dt}\right)=5\times{10}^5\times60=3\times{10}^7dyne=300\ N </script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 9</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>10 m ব্যাসার্ধের বৃত্তাকার পথে একটি গাড়ি সর্বোচ্চ <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-34-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>7</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-477" style="width: 5.292em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.324em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.269em, 1004.32em, 2.498em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-478"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-479" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">7</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-480"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.579em, 1000.49em, 3.839em, -999.998em); top: -4.544em; left: 0.822em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">–</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.094em, 1000.86em, 4.287em, -999.998em); top: -4.022em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block;             <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-35-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>7</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mn>10</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>9.8</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>98</mn><mrow><mn>10</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>9.8</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>45</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-491" style="width: 18.609em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 15.248em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.658em, 1015.08em, 2.789em, -999.998em); padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-498" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.781em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-504" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.78em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.781em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-505" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-506" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.379em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1002.26em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.629em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.105em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-507"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.256em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1001.85em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-508"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-509" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span><span style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-510"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-511" style="font-size: 70.7%; vertical-align: -0.039em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 0.371em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.62em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span><span style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-515" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span><span style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1002.13em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.064em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-517"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-518" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-519" style="font-size: 70.7%; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.38em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.379em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-521" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-522" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.297em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-523" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">98</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1002.13em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.064em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-524"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-525" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-526" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-527" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">9.8</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.3em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.297em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-528" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-529" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-530" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-531" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-532" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-533" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">45</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-534"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-535"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-536" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.402em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>7</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mn>10</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>9.8</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>98</mn><mrow><mn>10</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>9.8</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>∴</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>45</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-35">\rm tan\theta=\frac{v^2}{rg}=\frac{\left(7\sqrt2\right)^2}{10\times9.8}=\frac{98}{10\times9.8}=1\therefore\theta=45° </script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 10</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>বলের ভ্রামকের একক কোনটি?</p>

<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 11</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>স্থির অবস্থায় থাকা 16 g&nbsp;ভরের বস্তুর উপর একটি বল 3s&nbsp;যাবৎ ক্রিয়া করার পর বলের ক্রিয়া বন্ধ হলে বস্তুটি এর পরবর্তী 3s&nbsp;এ 81 cm দূরত্ব অতিক্রম করে। প্রযুক্ত বল কত?</p>

                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="row questionOptions">
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text">A</span>

                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>1.25 mN</p>
</label>
                        
                    </div>

            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-38-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>81</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.27</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-555" style="width: 10.535em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.609em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.822em, 1008.61em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-556"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-557" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-558" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-559" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.789em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1002.67em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.309em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-560"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-561" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">81</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-562" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-563"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-571" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.79em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.789em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-572" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-573" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-581" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-39-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>16</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>0.27</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>16</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0.09</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>1.44</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.44</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-582" style="width: 33.117em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 27.133em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1027.09em, 2.461em, -999.998em); font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-616" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-617" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-618" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">0.09</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-619" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-620" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1.44</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-621" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-622" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-623"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-624"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-625" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-626"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-627"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-628" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-629" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-630" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-631" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-632" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1.44</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-633" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-634" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-635" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.702em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>16</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>0.27</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>16</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>×</mo><mn>0.09</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>1.44</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.44</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-39">\rm F=ma=16\times{10}^{-3}\times\frac{0.27-0}{3}=16\times{10}^{-3}\times0.09=1.44\times{10}^{-3}N=1.44\ mN</script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>

                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-41-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>40</mn><mrow><mn>10</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>40</mn><mn>20</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-655" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-656" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-659" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-664" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-665"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-666"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-667" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-668" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-670"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-672" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-673" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-674" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-675" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-676"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-677" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-678" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-679" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">6</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-680" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-681" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-682" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-683" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-684" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">16</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-685" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-686" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-687" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-688" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">32</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-689" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-690" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.298em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.452em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>40</mn><mrow><mn>10</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>40</mn><mn>20</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>10</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>16</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>32</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-41">\rm a=\frac{40}{10+6+4}=\frac{40}{20}=2\ ms^{-2} \\
T_1=\left(10+6\right)\times2=16\times2=32\ N </script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 13</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>একটি বস্তুকে 9 m&nbsp;দীর্ঘ সুতার প্রান্তে বেঁধে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-42-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-691" style="width: 3.653em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.982em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1002.98em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-692"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-693" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-694" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-695" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-696"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.38em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.37em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-697" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-698"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-699"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-700" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-701" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>3</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-42">\rm3\ ms^{-1}</script></span> সমদ্রুতিতে বৃত্তাকার পথে ঘুরানো হলে সুতার টান 0.1 N। বস্তুটির ভর কত?</p>

                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="row questionOptions">
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-43-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>100</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-702" style="width: 3.782em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.099em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1003.1em, 2.598em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-703"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-704" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">100</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-705" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-706" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-707" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.331em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.169em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>100</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-43">\rm 100\ gm </script></span></p>
