            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-44-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>0.1</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow><msup><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>100</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-708" style="width: 18.035em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 14.756em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.863em, 1014.76em, 2.625em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-709"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-710" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-711" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-712" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1001.27em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-713"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-714" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-715"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.699em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-716" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.26em; left: 0.371em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-717" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.121em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-718" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.39em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-719" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-720" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">m</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-721" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-722" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.928em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.76em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.9em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-723"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-724" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-725" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-726" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.523em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-727"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.658em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-728" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.371em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-729" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.93em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.928em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-730" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-731" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.1</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-732" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-733" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-734" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-735" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-736" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">100</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-737" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-738" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-739" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.952em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>0.1</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow><msup><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.1</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>100</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-44">\rm T=\frac{mv^2}{r}\Rightarrow m=\frac{0.1\times9}{3^2}=0.1\ kg=100\ gm </script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 14</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>বৃত্তাকার পথে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-45-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>72</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-740" style="width: 4.473em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.653em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.38em, 1003.65em, 2.61em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-741"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-742" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">72</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-743" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-744" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-745" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-746"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-747"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-748" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">/</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-749" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">h</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.361em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.32em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>72</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-45">\rm 72\ km/h</script></span> সমদ্রুতিতে চলমান 100 kg&nbsp;ভরের কোনো গাড়ির কেন্দ্রমুখী বল 200 N হলে, বৃত্তাকার পথের ব্যাসার্ধ কত?</p>

                </div>

            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-46-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>20</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>200</mn><mn>100</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>20</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>200</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-750" style="width: 27.912em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 22.871em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.822em, 1022.87em, 2.461em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-759"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-760"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-761" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-762" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-763" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-764" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-765" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-766" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-767" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; font-family: MathJax_Main;">200</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.03em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-773" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">100</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.19em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-774" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-775" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-776" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-777" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-778"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-779" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-780"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-781"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-782" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-783" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-784" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-785" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-786" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-787" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.781em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-788"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.699em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-789" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.26em; left: 0.371em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-790" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.121em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-791" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.78em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.781em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-792" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-793" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">r</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-794" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-795" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1001.03em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.49em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-796"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-797"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-798"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-799" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">20</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-800" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-801" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.15em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-802" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-803" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">200</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-804" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-805" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>20</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>200</mn><mn>100</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>20</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>200</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-46">\rm v=20\ ms^{-1},\ a=\frac{F}{m}=\frac{200}{100}=2\ ms^{-2};a=\frac{v^2}{r}\Rightarrow r=\frac{{20}^2}{2}=200\ m  </script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 15</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>চাকার ভর 10 kg&nbsp;এবং চক্রগতির ব্যাসার্ধ 0.5 m&nbsp;হলে, জড়তার ভ্রামক কত?</p>

                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-51-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>0.5</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>2.5</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-842" style="width: 13.895em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.395em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1011.39em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-843"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-844" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">I</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-845" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-846" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">M</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-847"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-848" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-849" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-850" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-851" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">10</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-852" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-853" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.723em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1001.23em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-854"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-855"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-856" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.5</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 1.273em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-857" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-858" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-859" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2.5</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-860" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-861" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-862" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-863"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.273em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.82em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-864" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-865" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>0.5</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>2.5</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-51">\rm I=Mr^2=10\times{0.5}^2=2.5\ kgm^2  </script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 16</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>একটি চাকার ভর 3 kg&nbsp;ও চক্রগতির ব্যাসার্ধ 50 cm&nbsp;; চাকাটিতে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-1-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1" style="width: 4.324em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.541em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1003.54em, 2.61em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-4" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-8"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-9"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-10" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">/</span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-11"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.37em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-12" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-13" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.361em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.411em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>2</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>/</mo></mrow><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-1">\rm 2\ rad/s^2</script></span> কৌণিক ত্বরণ সৃষ্টি করতে হলে এতে কত টর্ক প্রয়োগ করতে হবে?</p>

                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-2-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03C4;</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>0.5</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.5</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-14" style="width: 20.207em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 16.559em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1016.56em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-15"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-16" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">τ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-17" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-18" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">I</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-19" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-20" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-21" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-22"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-23" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-24" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-25" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-26" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-27" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-28" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-29" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-30" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.723em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1001.23em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-31"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-32"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-33" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.5</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 1.273em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-34" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-35" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-36" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-37" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-38" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-39" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-40" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-41" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-42" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1.5</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-43" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-44" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-45" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.453em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>τ</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>0.5</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.5</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-2">\rm \tau=I\alpha=mk^2\alpha=(3\times{0.5}^2\times2)\ Nm=1.5\ Nm </script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 17</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>একটি নিরেট সিলিন্ডারের চক্রগতির ব্যাসার্ধ কত?</p>

                </div>

                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-8-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-105" style="width: 1.642em; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.867em, 1001.05em, 1.186em, -999.998em); height: 1.05em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.775em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.725em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-8">\rm \frac{r}{\sqrt2} </script></span></p>
</label>
                        <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                    </div>

            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-11-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-128" style="width: 10.781em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.814em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1008.57em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-129"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-130"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-132" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-133" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-134"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-137" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-138" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">M</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-139"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-140" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-141" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-142" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.95em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.523em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-147"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-148"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-149" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1000.37em, 1.232em, -999.998em); top: -1.678em; left: 0.576em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.039em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 0.371em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.62em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span><span style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.07em, 1.191em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-150" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.747em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-11">\rm \frac{1}{2}Mr^2=Mk^2\Rightarrow k=\frac{r}{\sqrt2}\  </script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 18</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-12-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>22.5</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-151" style="width: 3.206em; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-13-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>45</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-155" style="width: 1.827em; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-171"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-172"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-173" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-174" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-175" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">]</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.361em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.411em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-14">\rm [g=10\ ms^{-2}]</script></span></p>

                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="row questionOptions">
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-19-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></msqrt></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-224" style="width: 11.846em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.715em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.863em, 1009.72em, 2.584em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-225"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-226" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-227" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-228" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-229" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-230" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-231" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.781em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-232"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.699em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-233" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.26em; left: 0.371em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-234" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.62em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-235"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-236" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-237" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.78em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.781em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-238" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-239" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">v</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-240" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-241" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.1em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1003.03em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-242"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-243" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-244" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-245" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-246" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-247" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-248" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-249" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1003.08em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.588em; left: 0.986em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.076em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: -0.08em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: 2.379em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 0.412em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 0.904em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 1.395em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 1.887em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1001.03em, 4.51em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi>θ</mi></msqrt></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-19">\rm tan\theta=\frac{v^2}{rg}\Rightarrow v=\sqrt{rg\ tan\theta} </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-20-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>22.5</mn><mo>&amp;#xD7;</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>&amp;#xD7;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>45</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></msqrt><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>15</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-250" style="width: 17.256em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-251"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-252" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-253" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1008.4em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.588em; left: 0.822em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: 7.707em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-270"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-271"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-272" style="font-size: 70.7%; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-21-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>15</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>3.6</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>54</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-284" style="width: 13.158em;             <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 19</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>5 kg ভরের একটি বস্তু <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-22-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-310" style="width: 3.653em; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-317"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-318"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-319" style="font-size: 70.7%; top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-322"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-323" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-324" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-325" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-326"><span style="display: inline-block;         </div>
        <div class="row questionOptions">
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-24-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>5</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-332" style="width: 4.829em;             <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-28-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x0394;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>35</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-384" style="width: 19.961em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 16.355em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1016.36em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-385"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-386" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">Δ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-387" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-388" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-389" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">m</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-390" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-391" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-392"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-393"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-394" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-395" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-396" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-397" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-398" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-399" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-400" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-401" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-402" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-403" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-404" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-405"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-406" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-407" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-408" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-409" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-410"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-411" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-412" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-413" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-414" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-415" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-416" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">35</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-417" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-418" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-419" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-420" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-421"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-422" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-423"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-424"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-425" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-426" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>−</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>35</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-28">\rm \Delta p=m\left(v_2-v_1\right)=5\left(4-\left(-3\right)\right)=35\ kgms^{-1}</script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 20</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>জ্বালানীসহ একটি রকেটের ভর <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-29-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>8000</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-427" style="width: 4.026em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.281em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1003.28em, 2.573em, -999.998em);             <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-35-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></mfrac><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>30</mn><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1000</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>200</mn></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5000</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-495" style="width: 22.297em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 18.281em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1018.28em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-496"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-497" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-498" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-499" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.904em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em;
