font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-508"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-509" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-510" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.11em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.109em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-511" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-512" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">g</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-513" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-514" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">30</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-515" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-516" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.158em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1002.99em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.514em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-517"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-518" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1000</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-519" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-520" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">200</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.58em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.285em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-521" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1003.16em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 3.158em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-522" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-523" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">10</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-524" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-525" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">m</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-526" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-527" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5000</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-528" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-529" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-530" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.752em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></mfrac><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>30</mn><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1000</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>200</mn></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5000</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-35">\rm a=\frac{V_r}{m}\frac{dm}{dt}-g\Rightarrow30=\frac{1000\times200}{m}-10\therefore m=5000\ kg</script></span></p>

<p>জ্বালানীসহ রকেটের ভর <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-36-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>5000</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-531" style="width: 3.322em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.707em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.71em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-532"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-533" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5000</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-534" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-535" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-536" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>5000</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-36">\rm 5000\ kg</script></span> হবে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-37-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>3000</mn><mn>200</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>15</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-537" style="width: 4.92em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.018em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1003.98em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-538"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-539"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.518em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.39em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.695em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-540" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3000</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.03em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-541" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">200</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.52em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.518em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-542" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-543" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-544" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">15</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-545" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mn>3000</mn><mn>200</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>15</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-37">\rm \frac{3000}{200}s=15s</script></span>&nbsp;পর।</p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>

                <div class="serial"><span>Question 21</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-44-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-625" style="width: 2.2em;             <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-47-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-647" style="width: 12.01em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.838em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1009.8em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-648"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-649" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-650" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-651" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">m</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-652"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.9em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-653"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-654" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-655" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-656"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-657" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-658" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.03em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-659" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-660" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">m</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-661" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-662" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-663"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-664" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-665" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-666" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-667" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-668" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">t</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-669" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-670" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-671" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-47">\rm F=m\frac{dV}{dt}=m\left(4t\right)\therefore t=3s </script></span>&nbsp;সময়ে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-48-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>24</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-672" style="width: 10.002em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.199em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1008.16em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-673"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-674" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-675" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-676" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-677" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-678" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-679" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-680" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-681" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-682" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-683" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">24</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-684" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-685" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>24</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-48">\rm F=2\times4\times3N=24\ N</script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 22</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>10 gm ভরের একটি বুলেট 6 kg&nbsp;ভরের বন্দুক হতে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-49-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>600</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-686" style="width: 4.845em;             <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-54-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>0.01</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>600</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-741" style="width: 9.756em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.994em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1007.95em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-742"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-743" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.01</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-744" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-745" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">600</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-746" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-747" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">6</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-748" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-749" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">v</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-750" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-751" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>0.01</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>600</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>×</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-54">\rm0.01\times600+6\times v=0</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-55-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-752" style="width: 5.617em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.592em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1004.59em, 2.174em, -999.998em);             </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 23</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>2 kg ভর ও 30 cm&nbsp;দৈর্ঘ্যের একটি সুষম দন্ড এর প্রান্ত দিয়ে গমনকারী অক্ষের সাপেক্ষে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-57-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>4</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-778" style="width: 3.802em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.094em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.38em, 1003.06em, 2.61em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-779"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-780" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-781" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-782" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-783" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-784" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-785"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-786"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-787" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">/</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-788" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span></span><span style="display: inline-block;                 <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-61-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>0.42</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-834" style="width: 6.969em;             <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-889"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-891"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-892"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-893" style="font-size: 70.7%; </span>
            </div>
    </div>

        <h2>Chemistry (23)</h2>

                <div class="serial"><span>Question 24</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-52-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-866" style="width: 1.678em;                 <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p>1&nbsp;টি s&nbsp;ও 3&nbsp;টি p&nbsp;অরবিটাল 4&nbsp;টি সমশক্তি সম্পন্ন&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; <div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 25</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-54-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mn>6</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-878" style="width: 2.014em; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.275em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.392em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-59">\rm sp^3\rightarrow sp^3d </script></span></p>
</label>
                        
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">

                <div class="serial"><span>Question 28</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>নিচের কোন যৌগে সবচেয়ে কম পোলারায়ন ঘটে?</p>

                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-60-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo>+</mo></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-943" style="width: 1.764em;             <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 31</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>অ্যামোনিয়া ও অ্যামোনিয়াম আয়নে কেন্দ্রীয় পরমাণুর সংকরায়ন যথাক্রমে-</p>

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 33</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-73-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1119" style="width: 3.616em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.945em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1002.95em, 2.498em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1120"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1121" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1122"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.747em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1124" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1125" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1126" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span></span><span style="display: inline-block;                 </div>

            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-74-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1127" style="width: 2.953em;                     <p>নিচের কোন জোড়ে যৌগসমূহের সংকরায়ন ও বন্ধন কোণ একই?</p>

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 37</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>AgF বর্ণহীন কিন্তু AgBr হলুদ বর্ণযুক্ত হয় কেন?</p>

width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; </label>
                        <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 39</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>আউফবাউ নীতি অনুসারে নিচের কোন অরবিটালের শক্তি কম?</p>

        </div>

            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

</label>

            </div>
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text">C</span>

        </div>
            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-63-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-895" style="width: 2.83em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.297em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1002.22em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-896"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-897"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-898" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-899"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-900" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-901" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-902" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">l</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-903" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-63">\rm \left(n+l\right)</script></span>&nbsp;সূত্র ব্যবহার করে পাই,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-64-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-904" style="width: 6.805em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.576em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1005.49em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-905"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-906" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-907" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-908" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-909" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-910" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-911" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-912" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-913" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-914" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-915" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>;</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-64">\rm 4s=4+0=4\ ;</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-65-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-916" style="width: 6.477em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.289em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1005.25em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-917"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-918" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-919" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-920" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-921" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-922" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-923" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-924" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-925" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-65">\rm 4p=4+1=5</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-66-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-926" style="width: 13.609em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.15em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1011.11em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-927"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-928" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-929" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-930" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-931" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-932" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-933" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-934" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-935" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-936" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-937" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-938" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-939" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-940" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-941" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-942" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-943" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-944" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-945" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-66">\rm 3p=3+1=4\ ;3d=3+2=5</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-67-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-946" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-947"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-948" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-67">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;3p&nbsp;এর n এর মান কম তাই 3p&nbsp;এর শক্তি কম।</p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 41</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>দ্রাব্যতা গুণফল নিচের কোন ক্ষেত্রে প্রযোজ্য?</p>

                </div>

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 42</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>একটি নির্দিষ্ট তাপমাত্রায় 100 g ভরের <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-73-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1009" style="width: 2.2em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.79em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1001.79em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1010"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1011" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1012" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1013" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.957em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-73">\rm KCl</script></span>&nbsp;এর একটি সম্পৃক্ত দ্রবণে 20 g দ্রব দ্রবীভূত আছে। ঐ তাপমাত্রায় <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-74-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1014" style="width: 2.2em; top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1015"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1016" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1017" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1018" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span></span><span style="display: inline-block;                 </div>
            </div>
        </div>

            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p>দ্রবণের ভর&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-75-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>100</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1019" style="width: 3.322em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.707em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1002.71em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1020"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1021" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1022" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">100</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1023" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1024" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mn>100</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-75">\rm =100\ g</script></span>, দ্রবের ভর&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-76-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>20</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1025" style="width: 2.83em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.297em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1002.3em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1026"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1027" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1028" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">20</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1029" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1030" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mn>20</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-76">\rm=20\ g</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-77-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1031" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1032"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1033" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-77">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;দ্রাবকের ভর&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-78-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>80</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1034" style="width: 2.83em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.297em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1002.3em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1035"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1036" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1037" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">80</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1038" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1039" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mn>80</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-78">\rm =80\ g</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-79-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1040" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1041"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1042" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-79">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;দ্রাব্যতা&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-80-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>20</mn><mn>80</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>100</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>25</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1043" style="width: 7.215em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.904em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1005.86em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1044"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1045" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1046" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1048" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">80</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1049" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1052" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">25</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; </span>

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 43</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>দ্বিতীয় কক্ষপথে আবর্তনশীল ইলেকট্রনের বেগ কত?</p>

                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="row questionOptions">
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-81-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1053" style="width: 2.461em; top: -1.273em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 1.733em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.05em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.669em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi></mrow></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-81">\rm\frac{h}{2\pi mr} </script></span></p>
</label>
                        
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-82-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1062" style="width: 2.461em; top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1063"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1064"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.733em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.139em; margin-left: 0.139em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.372em, 1000.73em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.415em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.362em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1065"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1066" style="font-size: 70.7%; clip: rect(3.418em, 1001.6em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -3.641em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.817em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1068"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1069" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1070" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1071" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1072" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 1.733em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.05em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.669em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>π</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi></mrow></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-82">\rm \frac{2h}{3\pi mr} </script></span></p>
</label>
                        
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text">C</span>

                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-83-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1073" style="width: 2.051em; top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1074"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1075"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.414em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.139em; margin-left: 0.139em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.372em, 1000.37em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.415em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.18em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1076" style="font-size: 70.7%;                         <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                    </div>

            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>অনির্ণেয়</p>
</label>
