            </div>
        </div>
            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p>আমরা জানি,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-84-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1081" style="width: 9.961em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.158em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1008.16em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1082"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1083" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1084" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1085" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1086" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1087" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.904em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.78em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.408em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1088"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1089" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1090" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">h</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.78em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1091"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1092" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1093" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.9em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.904em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1094" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1095" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">v</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1096" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1097" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.297em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.78em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.408em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1098"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1099" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1100" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">h</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1002.17em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.105em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1101"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1102" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1103" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1104" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1105" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1106" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.3em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.297em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><mo>×</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi></mrow></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-84">\rm mvr=\frac{nh}{2\pi}\therefore v=\frac{nh}{2\pi\times mr}</script></span></p>

<p>এখানে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-85-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1107" style="width: 7.461em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.109em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1006.11em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1108"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1109" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1110" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1111" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1112" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1113" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1114" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">v</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1115" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1116" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1117" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">h</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1001.27em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.654em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1118"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1119" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1120" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1121" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.39em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mrow><mi>π</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi></mrow></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-85">\rm n=2\ \therefore v=\frac{h}{\pi mr}</script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 44</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>হাইড্রোজেন পরমাণুর প্রথম ও তৃতীয় শক্তিস্তরের ব্যাসার্ধের অনুপাত-</p>

                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="row questionOptions">
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-86-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1122" style="width: 0.913em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.731em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.186em, 1000.73em, 2.689em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1123"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1124"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.458em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.139em; margin-left: 0.139em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.418em, 1000.32em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.415em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.18em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1125" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.418em, 1000.32em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -3.641em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.18em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1126" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.867em, 1000.46em, 1.186em, -999.998em); top: -1.273em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 0.458em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.05em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;             <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-90-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><msub><mi>r</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msubsup><mi>n</mi><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><msubsup><mi>n</mi><mn>2</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>9</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1142" style="width: 5.576em; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.74em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.629em; left: 50%; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.86em, 1.191em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1161" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1162" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1164" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.897em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><msub><mi>r</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msubsup><mi>n</mi><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><msubsup><mi>n</mi><mn>2</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>9</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-90">\frac{r_1}{r_2}=\frac{n_1^2}{n_2^2}=\frac{1}{9}  </script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 46</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>3p&nbsp;অরবিটালের জন্য নিচের কোন কোয়ান্টাম সংখ্যার সেটটি সঠিক?</p>

                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="row questionOptions">
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-91-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1165" style="width: 15.622em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.798em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1012.8em, 2.735em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1166"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1167" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1168" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;     <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
        <h2>Higher Mathematics (25)</h2>
    </div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 47</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-95-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1261" style="width: 15.613em;             <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-100-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msqrt><msup><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1305" style="width: 11.109em; top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1306"><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-1307"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.699em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1004.67em, 4.223em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1308"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1309"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1310" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1311" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1312" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1313" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1314" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1315" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1316" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1317" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">c</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1004.72em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.752em; left: 0.986em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.715em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: -0.08em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: 4.018em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 0.412em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 1.969em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; left: 2.994em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 3.486em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1001.03em, 4.51em, -999.998em); top: -4.178em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1318" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1319" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1320" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1321" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">c</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1322" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1323" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msqrt><msup><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-100">\rm \sqrt{1^2+2^2-c}=0\therefore c=5 </script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>

<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 48</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>কোনটি বৃত্তের সমীকরণ?</p>

                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="row questionOptions">
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-96-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1359" style="width: 9.565em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.835em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.277em, 1007.79em, 2.552em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1360"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1361"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.959em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.463em, 1000.5em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1362" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.369em; left: 0.549em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1363" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1364" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1365" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;             <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-100-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>f</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1433" style="width: 16.273em; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1458" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">c</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1459" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">f</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-100">\rm ax^2+by^2+2hxy+2gx+2fy+c=0</script></span>&nbsp;বৃত্তের সমীকরণ হলে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-101-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mo>&amp;#x2260;</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1461" style="width: 7.379em;             </div>
    </div>

            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-107-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>6</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>7</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>10</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>6</mn><mn>10</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>7</mn><mn>10</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1538" style="width: 20.125em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 16.477em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1016.31em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1539"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1540"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1541" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1542" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1543" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1544" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1547" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1548" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1574" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1575" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1576" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">7</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1577" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1578" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>6</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>7</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>10</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>6</mn><mn>10</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>7</mn><mn>10</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-107">\rm x^2+y^2-\frac{6}{5}x+\frac{7}{5}y-\frac{10}{5}=0 
\therefore c=\left(\frac{6}{10},\ -\frac{7}{10}\right) 
</script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>

padding-left: 0.23em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1626" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1627" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1628" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.392em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>25</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-110">\rm x^2+y^2-4y=25 </script></span></p>
</label>
                        
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-111-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>21</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1629" style="width: 9.474em;             <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-113-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi></mrow><mn>5</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1657" style="width: 8.199em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.723em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.863em, 1006.72em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1658"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1659" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1660" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1661" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1662" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1663" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1664" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1667" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1668" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1669" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1670" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1671" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1672" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1673" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1674"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.27em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.654em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1675"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1676" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1677" style="font-size: 70.7%; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.39em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>;</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi>θ</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi></mrow><mn>5</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-113">\rm cos\theta=\frac{x}{5};\ sin\theta\ \frac{2-y}{5}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-114-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi></mrow><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1680" style="width: 9.346em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.666em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.699em, 1007.58em, 2.953em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1681"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1682" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1683" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.092em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1001.52em, 4.51em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1684"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1685" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1686"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1687" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1688" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1689" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.588em; left: 1.641em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1690" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1691" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1692" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.281em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(2.748em, 1002.67em, 4.797em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1693"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1694" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">(</span></span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1695"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.27em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.654em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1696"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1697" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1698" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1699" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1700" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.39em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1701" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.875em; left: 2.83em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1702" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1703" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1704" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.847em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi></mrow><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-114">\rm \therefore\left(\frac{x}{5}\right)^2+\left(\frac{2-y}{5}\right)^2=1</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-115-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>21</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1705" style="width: 10.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.732em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1008.69em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1706"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1707" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1708" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1709" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1710" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1711" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1712" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1713" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1714" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1715" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1716" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1717" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1718" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1719" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">21</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1720" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1721" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>21</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-115">\rm \Rightarrow x^2+y^2-4y-21=0</script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 51</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>কোনো বৃত্তের একটি ব্যাসের প্রান্তবিন্দুদ্বয় (7,&nbsp;2) এবং <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-116-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1722" style="width: 4.51em; top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1723"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1724"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1725" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1726"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1727" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1728" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1729" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;             <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-120-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>7</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>47</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1788" style="width: 14.347em; top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1789"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1790"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.959em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.369em; left: 0.549em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1792" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1793" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1794" style="padding-left: 0.23em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.959em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.463em, 1000.5em, 4.328em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1795" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.369em; left: 0.549em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1796" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1797" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1798" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">7</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1799" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1800" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1801" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1802" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1803" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1804" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">47</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1805" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1806" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.275em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.392em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>7</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>47</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-120">\rm x^2+y^2+7x+2y-47=0 </script></span></p>
</label>
                        
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-121-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>11</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>22</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1807" style="width: 28.527em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 23.363em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1023.32em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1808"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1809"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1810" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1811"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1812" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1813" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1814" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1815" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1816" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1817" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1818"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1819" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1820" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1821" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1822" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1823" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1824" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1825" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1826"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1827" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1828" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1829" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">7</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1830" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1831" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1832" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1833"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1834" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1835" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1836" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1837" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1838" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1839" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1840" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1841" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1842" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1843" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1844" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1845" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1846" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1847" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1848" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1849" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">11</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1850" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1851" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1852" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1853" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1854" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">22</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1855" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1856" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>11</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>22</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-121">\rm \left(y-2\right)\left(y+3\right)+\left(x-7\right)\left(x-4\right)=0 
\Rightarrow x^2+y^2-11x+y+22=0 </script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 52</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>মূলবিন্দুগামী কোনো বৃত্ত X&nbsp;ও Y&nbsp;অক্ষের ধনাত্মক দিক হতে যথাক্রমে 5&nbsp;ও 1&nbsp;একক কর্তন করলে বৃত্তটির সমীকরণ-</p>

                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="row questionOptions">
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                    </div>

                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-123-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1875" style="width: 13.755em; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1884" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1885" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;                 <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 140px; height: 138px;"></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-126-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2.5</mn><mo>;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>f</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>0.5</mn><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><mo>&amp;#x2235;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1925" style="width: 12.133em; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.614em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mn>9</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-129">\frac{9}{2} </script></span>&nbsp;একক</p>
</label>
                        
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-130-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1963" style="width: 0.913em;                         <span class="fas fa-check"></span>

            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-131-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1968" style="width: 0.913em;
