        </div>
            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-132-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1973" style="width: 22.871em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 18.732em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1018.69em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1974"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1975" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1976" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1977" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1978" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1979" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1980" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1981" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1982" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1983" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1984" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1985" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1986" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1987" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1988" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1989" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1990" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1991" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1992" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1993" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1994" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1995" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1996" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1997" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1998" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1999" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2000" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2001" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2002" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2003" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2004" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2005" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2006" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2007" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2008" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2009" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2010" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-132">\rm r-3\ cos\theta=0 \Rightarrow r^2-3rcos\theta=0 \Rightarrow x^2+y^2-3x=0 </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-133-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>1.5</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mn>1.5</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2011" style="width: 8.117em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.641em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1006.6em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2012"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2013" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2014" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">r</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2015" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-2016" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.748em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1001.72em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2017"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2018"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.723em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1001.23em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2019"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2020"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2021" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1.5</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 1.273em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2022" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1001.72em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.752em; left: 0.986em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.723em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: -0.08em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: 1.027em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 0.453em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1001.03em, 4.51em, -999.998em); top: -4.219em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2023" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2024" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1.5</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>1.5</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mn>1.5</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-133">\rm \therefore r=\sqrt{{1.5}^2}=1.5</script></span>&nbsp;একক</p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div><div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 54</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.988em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1003.95em, 2.349em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1709"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1710" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1711" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1712" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1713" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1714" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1715" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1716" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">r</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.043em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.957em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-121">\rm 2cos\theta=r</script></span>&nbsp;বৃত্তের কেন্দ্র-</p>

                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="row questionOptions">

            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-122-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1717" style="width: 20.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 16.928em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1016.89em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1718"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1719" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1720" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1721" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1722" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1723" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1724" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1725" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1726" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1727" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1728" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1729" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1730" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1731" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1732" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1733" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1734" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1735" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1736" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1737" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1739" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1740" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1741" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1742" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1743" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1744" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1745" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1746" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1747" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1748" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1749" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1750" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1751" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1752" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-122">\rm2rcos\theta=r^2\Rightarrow2x=x^2+y^2\Rightarrow x^2+y^2-2x=0 </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-123-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1753" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1754"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1755" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-123">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;কেন্দ্র (1,0)</p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>

            <div class="row">

                    <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-134-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>39</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2025" style="width: 14.272em;                 </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="row questionOptions">
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>পরস্পর ছেদ করে</p>
</label>
                        
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>পরস্পর ছেদ করে না বা স্পর্শ করে না</p>
</label>
                        
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>বহিঃস্থভাবে স্পর্শ করে</p>
</label>
                        
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>অন্তঃস্থভাবে স্পর্শ করে</p>

                        <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-136-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>&amp;#x2261;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>&amp;#x2261;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2063" style="width: 12.215em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2068" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">≡</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2069" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2070" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2071"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2072" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2073" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2074" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2137" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2138" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">u</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2139" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2140" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2141" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2142" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2143" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msup><mn>4</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>13</mn></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">u</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>;</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-138">\rm r_2=\sqrt{4^2+1^2-13}=2\ unit\ ;</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-139-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msup><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>4</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>u</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2144" style="width: 11.6em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-140-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2169" style="width: 7.461em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2175"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2181" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2185" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; </span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div><div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 56</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>কেন্দ্র (7, 5) ও 1 একক ব্যাসার্ধ এবং কেন্দ্র (α,β) ও 2 একক ব্যাসার্ধবিশিষ্ট বৃত্তদ্বয় পরস্পরকে বহিঃস্থভাবে (4, 3) বিন্দুতে স্পর্শ করলে (α,β) =?</p>

            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-107-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1430" style="width: 3.691em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.008em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1002.92em, 2.598em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1431"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1432" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1433" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1434" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1435" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1436" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.184em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1437" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.331em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.336em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-107">(-1,2) </script></span></p>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 140px; height: 48px;"></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-108-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>4</mn><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1438" style="width: 18.609em; top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1439"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1440" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1441" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1442" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.379em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.363em, 1002.22em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.588em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.145em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1443"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1444" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1453" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1454" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.38em, 1.191em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1455" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1456" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; margin-left: -1.105em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1465"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1466" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1467" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1468" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1475" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1476" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.34em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.338em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1477" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1478" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1479" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1480" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1481" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.547em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.952em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>4</mn><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>∴</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>β</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>∴</mo><mi>β</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-108">\rm4=\frac{\alpha+2\left(7\right)}{1+2}\therefore\alpha=-2\ ;3=\frac{\beta+2\left(5\right)}{1+2}\therefore\beta=-1</script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.6em, 1000.5em, 3.918em, -999.998em); top: -4.551em; left: 0.822em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">–</span><span style="display: inline-block;             <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-148-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><msqrt><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2230" style="width: 16.723em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>±</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><msqrt><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mo>±</mo><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-148">\rm r=1\ ;\ m=1; 
k=\pm r\sqrt{1+m^2}=\pm\sqrt2 </script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 58</span></div>

                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-151-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>u</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2289" style="width: 4.146em;             <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-154-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2321" style="width: 5.781em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-155-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msup><mn>2</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>u</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2335" style="width: 11.395em; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2342" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: 4.059em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msup><mn>2</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">u</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-155">\rm r=\sqrt{2^2+3^2+3}=4\ unit</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-156-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>12</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>65</mn></mrow><mn>13</mn></mfrac><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>u</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2357" style="width: 12.256em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.043em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.641em, 1010em, 3.568em, -999.998em); top: -2.867em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2358"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2359" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2360" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2361" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2362" style="vertical-align: 1.109em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.289em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -3.277em; left: 0em;">∣<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -2.58em; left: 0em;">∣<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2363"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.904em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.363em, 1005.74em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.588em; left: 50%; margin-left: -2.867em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2364"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2365" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">12</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2366"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2367" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2368"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2369" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2370" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2371" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2372" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2373" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2374"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2375" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2376"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2377" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2378" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2379" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2380" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2381" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">65</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2382" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">13</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1005.9em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 5.904em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2383" style="vertical-align: 1.109em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.289em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -3.277em; left: 0em;">∣<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -2.58em; left: 0em;">∣<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2384" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2385" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2386" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2387" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">u</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2388" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2389" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2390" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.871em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.747em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.152em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>12</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>65</mn></mrow><mn>13</mn></mfrac><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">u</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-156">\rm l=\left|\frac{12\left(-2\right)+5\left(-3\right)+65}{13}\right|=2\ unit</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-157-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2391" style="width: 0.658em; </span>
            </div>
    </div>

                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-134-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>f</mi><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1904" style="width: 6.286em;                 <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1683" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1684" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1685" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">11</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1003.16em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.752em; left: 0.986em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.158em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: -0.08em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: 2.461em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 0.412em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 0.904em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 1.436em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 1.928em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1001.03em, 4.51em, -999.998em); top: -4.178em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.398em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.702em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>2</mn><msqrt><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msqrt><msup><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>11</mn></msqrt></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-117">\rm 2\sqrt{g^2-c}=2\sqrt{5^2+11}</script></span>&nbsp;একক = 12 একক ; কেন্দ্র&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-118-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1686" style="width: 3.035em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.461em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1002.38em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1687"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1688" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1689" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1690" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1691" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1692" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1693" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-118">(-5,2)</script></span>&nbsp;;&nbsp;কেন্দ্র হতে x অক্ষের দূরত্ব = 2 একক।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-119-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1694" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1695"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1696" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-119">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;ক্ষেত্রফল&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-120-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>12</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1697" style="width: 5.945em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.879em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1004.63em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1698"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1699" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1700" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1701" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1703" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1704" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1705" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; </span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 61</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>X ও Y&nbsp;অক্ষ এবং&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-159-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>24</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>7</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>168</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2417" style="width: 8.05em;                         <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-162-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>24</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2462" style="width: 12.252em;             <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>

                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 150px; height: 141px;"></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-164-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>&amp;#x2261;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>24</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>7</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>24</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>25</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>7</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>24</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>7</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>24</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>25</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2261;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2498" style="width: 14.059em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-165-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2538" style="width: 11.355em; position: relative; width: 3.445em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1002.91em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2542"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2543" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2544"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2545" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2546" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2547" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2548" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 2.994em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2559" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2560" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2561" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2563" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-165">\rm \therefore\left(x-3\right)^2+\left(y-3\right)^2=3^2</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-166-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2564" style="width: 12.379em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.125em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1010.08em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2565"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2566" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2567" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2568" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2569" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2570" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2571" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2572" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2573" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2574" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2575" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">6</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2576" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2577" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2578" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">6</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2579" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2580" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2581" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">9</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2582" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2583" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-166">\rm \Rightarrow x^2+y^2-6x-6y+9=0</script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 62</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-167-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2584" style="width: 13.787em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.291em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1011.25em, 2.535em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2585"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2586"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.971em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.52em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2587" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.523em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2588" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2589" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2590" style="padding-left: 0.225em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.971em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.52em, 4.287em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2591" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.523em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2592" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2593" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2594" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">6</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2595" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2596" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2597" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2598" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2599" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2600" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">p</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2601" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2602" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.27em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.366em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-167">\rm x^2+y^2+6x+ky+p=0</script></span>&nbsp;বৃত্তটি X&nbsp;ও Y&nbsp;উভয় অক্ষকে স্পর্শ করলে এর ব্যাসার্ধ-</p>

                </div>
