            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p>X-অক্ষকে স্পর্শ করলে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-168-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2603" style="width: 4.059em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.322em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1003.28em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2604"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2605" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2606" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2607" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2608" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2609" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2610" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">c</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-168">\rm\Rightarrow g^2=c</script></span></p>

<p>Y-অক্ষকে স্পর্শ করলে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-169-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>f</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2611" style="width: 3.977em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.24em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1003.2em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2612"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2613" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2614" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2615" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">f<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2616" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2617" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2618" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">c</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">f</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-169">\rm \Rightarrow f^2=c</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-170-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>f</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2619" style="width: 5.904em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.838em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1004.8em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2620"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2621" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2622" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2623" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2624" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2625" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2626" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2627" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">f<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2628" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2629" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2630" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">c</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">f</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-170">\rm \therefore g^2=f^2=c</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-171-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>f</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi></msqrt><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>u</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2631" style="width: 15.658em; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2644" style="font-size: 70.7%; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2646" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">c</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2653" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2654" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2655" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2656" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">u</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2657" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2658" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2659" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; </span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div><div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 63</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>কোনো বৃত্তের কেন্দ্র (2, 3) এবং যেকোনো একটি জ্যা এর সমীকরণ ও দৈর্ঘ্য যথাক্রমে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-101-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1324" style="width: 8.348em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.82em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1006.78em, 2.535em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1325"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1326" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1327" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1328" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1329" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1330" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1331" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1332" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">7</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1333" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1334" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.27em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.184em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-101">\rm 3x+4y+7=0</script></span> ও 24 একক হলে বৃত্তটির ব্যাসার্ধ কত একক ?</p>

            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 100px; height: 92px;">\</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-102-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow><msqrt><msup><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>4</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt></mfrac><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1335" style="width: 9.674em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1004.1em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; position: relative; width: 0.289em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -3.277em; left: 0em;">∣<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1368" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.994em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.948em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.502em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow><msqrt><msup><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>4</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt></mfrac><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-102">\rm OC=\left|\frac{3\left(2\right)+4\left(3\right)+7}{\sqrt{3^2+4^2}}\right|=5 </script></span></p>

            </div>
    </div>

position: relative; width: 0.971em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.52em, 4.287em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1924" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.523em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1925" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1926" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1927" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1928" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1929" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1930" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.366em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>10</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-135">\rm x^2+y^2-5x+10y+c=0</script></span>&nbsp;বৃত্তে অঙ্কিত স্পর্শকের দৈর্ঘ্য 3&nbsp;একক হলে বৃত্তটির ব্যাসার্ধ কত?</p>

                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-140-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msup><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>10</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi></msqrt><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; /><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>f</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi></msqrt><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msqrt><mn>117</mn></msqrt><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1963" style="width: 24.182em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 19.797em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.691em, 1019.8em, 7.953em, -999.998em); top: -5.039em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1964"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 19.797em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(2.666em, 1018.08em, 4.715em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1965" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1966" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-1967" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.502em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1011.44em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1968"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1969"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1970" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1971" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1972" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1973" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1974" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.76em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.764em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 5.043em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -3.448em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 5.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>3</mn><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msup><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>10</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi></msqrt><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">f</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi></msqrt><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msqrt><mn>117</mn></msqrt><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-140">\rm 3=\sqrt{1^2+1^2-5\left(1\right)+10\left(1\right)+c}\ \therefore c=2 \\ r=\sqrt{g^2+f^2-c}=\sqrt{\left(-\frac{5}{2}\right)^2+5^2-2}=\frac{\sqrt{117}}{2} </script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 65</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p><!--[if gte msEquation 12]><m:oMath><m:sSup><m:sSupPr><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;

            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-114-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>f</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>6</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; /><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; width: 0px; height: 6.887em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -6.147em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 7.303em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">f</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>6</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-114">\rm g=\frac{-5}{2}\ ;\ \ f=\frac{6}{2}=3\ ,\ \ c=6 \\
x\left(2\right)+y\left(0\right)-\frac{5}{2}\left(x+2\right)+3\left(y+0\right)+6=0 \\
\Rightarrow2x-\frac{5}{2}x-5+3y+6=0 \\
\Rightarrow-x+6y+2=0\ \ \therefore x-6y-2=0 </script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 66</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-172-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>8</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>16</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2660" style="width: 14.272em; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2665" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2666" style="padding-left: 0.225em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.971em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.52em, 4.287em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2667" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.523em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2668" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2669" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2670" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2671" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2672" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2673" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;             <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-177-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2725" style="width: 5.002em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.1em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1003.86em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2726"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2727" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2728" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2729" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2730"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2731" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2732" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2733" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2734" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2735" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2736" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2737" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2738" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>;</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-177">\rm C\left(-1,\ 4\right);\ </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-178-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msup><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>4</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>16</mn></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2739" style="width: 10.166em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.322em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.822em, 1008.24em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2740"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2741" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2742" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-2743" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.273em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1005.21em, 4.223em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2744"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2745"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2746" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2747" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2748" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2749" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-180-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>12</mn><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi></mrow><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>13</mn></msqrt></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2776" style="width: 10.33em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-181-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>13</mn></msqrt><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msqrt><mn>13</mn></msqrt><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>10</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2793" style="width: 12.953em; <div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 67</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-182-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>16</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2811" style="width: 6.708em; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2820" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2821" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">16</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.27em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.366em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>16</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-182">\rm x^2+y^2=16 </script></span> বৃত্তের কোনো জ্যা এর মধ্যবিন্দু <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-183-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2822" style="width: 3.951em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.243em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.38em, 1003.13em, 2.61em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2823"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2824"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2825" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2826"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2827" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2828" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2829" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2830" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2831" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2832" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.361em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.32em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-183">\rm \left(-1,\ 3\right)</script></span> হলে তার সমীকরণ-</p>

                </div>
            </div>

            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-188-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>16</mn><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>16</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2863" style="width: 30.863em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 25.289em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1025.25em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2864"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2865"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2866" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2867"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2868" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2869" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2870" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2871" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2872" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2873" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2874" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2875" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2876" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">16</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2877" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2878" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.502em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1001.97em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2879"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2880" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2881"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2882" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2883" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2884" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 2.051em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2885" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2886" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2887" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2888" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2889" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2890" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2891" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">16</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2892" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2893" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2894" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2895" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2896" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2897" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2898" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2899" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">10</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2900" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2901" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2902" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2903" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2904" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2905" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2906" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">10</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2907" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2908" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>16</mn><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>16</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>∴</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-188">\rm \left(-1\right)x+3y-16=\left(-1\right)^2+3^2-16 
\Rightarrow-x+3y=10 
\therefore3y-x-10=0 </script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 68</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-189-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>9</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2909" style="width: 13.713em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.216em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1011.18em, 2.535em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2910"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2911"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.971em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.52em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2912" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.523em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2913" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2914" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2915" style="padding-left: 0.225em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.971em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.52em, 4.287em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2916" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.523em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2917" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2918" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2919" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">9</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2920" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2921" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2922" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2923" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2924" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2925" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">7</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2926" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2927" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.27em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.366em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>9</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-189">\rm x^2+y^2-9x+3y-7=0</script></span>&nbsp;বৃত্তের বহিঃস্থ বিন্দু কোনটি?</p>

                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-194-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; /><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>15</mn><mo>;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3018" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3019" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">29</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3020" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-3021" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1009.47em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: 0.289em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-3022" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3023" style=""><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3024" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3025"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3026" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3027" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-3028" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3029" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3030" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3031" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3032" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3033" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">L</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3034" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">S</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3035" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3036" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3037" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">11</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 6.314em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -5.598em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 6.553em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>;</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>15</mn><mo>;</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>29</mn><mo>;</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>11</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-194">\rm \left(1,\ 3\right)\Rightarrow LS=3;\  \\
\left(3,\ 2\right)\Rightarrow LS=-15;\  \\
\left(5,\ -1\right)\Rightarrow LS=-29;\  \\
\left(2,\ -5\right)\Rightarrow LS=-11 </script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p>কেন্দ্র&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-128-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1794" style="width: 3.814em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.117em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1003.03em, 2.338em, -999.998em); <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-130-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>6</mn><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi></mrow><msqrt><msup><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>4</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt></mfrac><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>25</mn><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mn>30</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>55</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1827" style="width: 21.764em; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1866" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">25</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1867" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.948em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.502em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>6</mn><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi></mrow><msqrt><msup><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>4</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt></mfrac><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>25</mn><mo>=</mo><mo>±</mo><mn>30</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>55</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-130">\rm 6=\left|\frac{3\left(-3\right)+4\left(-4\right)+k}{\sqrt{3^2+4^2}}\right|\Rightarrow\ k-25=\pm30\Rightarrow k=55,-5</script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div><div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 70</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-141-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2034" style="width: 13.713em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.216em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1011.18em, 2.535em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2035"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2036"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.971em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute;             <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>

    <div class="row question">

            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-201-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>7</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3109" style="width: 11.314em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3114" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3115" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3118" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3119" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3126" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>7</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-201">\rm x^2+y^2+7x+3y-\frac{3}{2}=0</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-202-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3130" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3131"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3132" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-202">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;দৈর্ঘ্য&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-203-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msup><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1.5</mn></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msqrt><mn>66</mn></msqrt><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>u</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3133" style="width: 16.068em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.158em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.74em, 1013.12em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3134"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3135" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-3136" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.92em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1008.86em, 4.223em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3137"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3138"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3139" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3140" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3141" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3142" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3143" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3144" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3145" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3146" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">7</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3147" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3148" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1.5</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1008.94em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -1.678em; left: 0.576em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.039em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 0.699em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.62em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span><span style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.44em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; </span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
    <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
        <h2>Biology (22)</h2>
    </div>

                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>একটি পূর্ণাঙ্গ রুই মাছের দেহে মোট কত প্রকার পাখনা পাওয়া যায়?</p>

                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: পাখনা সমূহ - বক্ষ পাখনা, শ্রোণী পাখনা, পৃষ্ঠ পাখনা, পায়ু পাখনা, পুচ্ছ পাখনা।</p>

                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: পূর্ণ ফুলকা - হলোব্রাঙ্ক; অর্ধ ফুলকাকে ‘ডেমিব্রাঙ্ক’ও বলা হয়।</p>

            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 81</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>রুই মাছের হৃৎপিণ্ডের বৃহত্তম প্রকোষ্ঠ কোনটি?</p>

                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="row questionOptions">
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>অ্যাট্রিয়াম</p>
</label>
                        <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>ভেন্ট্রিকল</p>
</label>
                        
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>সাইনাস ভেনোসাস</p>
</label>
                        
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>সাইনু অ্যাট্রিয়াম</p>
</label>
                        
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><strong>অ্যাট্রিয়াম:</strong> এটি পেরিকার্ডিয়াল গহ্বরের সম্মুখ পৃষ্ঠ ভাগে অবস্থিত পাতলা প্রাচীরবিশিষ্ট বৃহত্তম প্রকোষ্ঠ। এটি একদিকে সাইনাস ভেনোসাস অন্যদিকে অ্যাট্রিও-ভেন্ট্রিকুলার ছিদ্রপথে ভেন্ট্রিকলে উন্মুক্ত।</p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 83</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>কোন হরমোন পাকস্থলিতে গ্যাস্ট্রিক জুস ক্ষরণে বাঁধা দেয়?</p>

                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="row questionOptions">
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>কোলেসিস্টোকাইনিন</p>
</label>
                        
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>সিক্রেটিন</p>
</label>
                        <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>প্যানক্রিওজাইমিন</p>
</label>
                        
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>গ্যাস্ট্রিন</p>
</label>
                        
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><strong>জেনে রাখো:</strong> সিক্রেটিন পাকস্থলিতে গ্যাস্ট্রিক জুস ক্ষরণে বাঁধা দেয়, আর কোলেসিস্টোকাইনিন পাইলোরিক স্ফিংক্টারের পেশিকে সংকুচিত করে পাকস্থলি শূন্য হতে বাঁধা দেয়।</p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>

            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 85</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>নিচের কোন&nbsp;BMI (Body Mass Index)&nbsp;অতিরিক্ত ওজন নির্দেশ করে?</p>

            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                    </div>

            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">

                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
