            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: পিত্তরস → 400-800 mL/day<br>
গ্যাস্ট্রিক জুস → 2L/day<br>
আন্ত্রিক রস → 1-2L/day</p>
</span>

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 90</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>গ্লুকোজ থেকে গ্লাইকোজেন তৈরি হওয়ার প্রক্রিয়া-</p>

                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="row questionOptions">
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>গ্লাইকোজেনেসিস</p>
</label>
                        <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>গ্লাইকোজেনোলাইসিস</p>
</label>
                        
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>গ্লুকোনিওজেনেসিস</p>
</label>
                        
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>গ্লুকোওজেনেসিস</p>
</label>
                        
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: ইনসুলিন গ্লাইকোজেনেসিসে সাহায্য করে।</p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>

    <div class="row question">

            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-208-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3194" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.395em, 1000.49em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3195"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3196" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.653em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>α</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-208">\alpha</script></span> - গ্লুকাগন; <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-209-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3197" style="width: 0.576em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.453em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1000.45em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3198"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3199" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>β</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-209">\beta </script></span> - ইনসুলিন; <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-210-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B4;</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3200" style="width: 0.699em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.576em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1000.33em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3201"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3202" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">δ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-3203" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>δ</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-210">\delta\ </script></span> - সোমাটোস্ট্যাটিন; <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-211-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3204" style="width: 1.355em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.109em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1001.07em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3205"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3206" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3207" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-211">\rm PP</script></span> - প্যানক্রিয়েটিক পলিপেপটাইড।</p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial"><span>Question 93</span></div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>চিকিৎসা বিজ্ঞানের যে শাখায় স্থূলতার কারণ, প্রতিরোধ, চিকিৎসা ও অস্ত্রপ্রচার সম্বন্ধে আলোচনা করা হয় তাকে কী বলে?</p>

                </div>
